name: makefile-rust-wasm-ts-scss-example
description: Web application example with Makefile, Rust-generated WASM, TypeScript and SCSS

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.rebuild-parallel: npm run clean && npm run build-parallel
scripts.watch: bash -c "while true; do make -rRj8 --silent all; sleep 1; done"
scripts.watch-dev: bash -c "while true; do make -rRj8 --silent dev; sleep 1; done"
scripts.watch-rel: bash -c "while true; do make -rRj8 --silent rel; sleep 1; done"
scripts.test-node: cd .. && for wasm in wasm-*; do (cd "$wasm" && cargo test && wasm-pack test --node ); done
scripts.test-chrome: cd .. && for wasm in wasm-*; do (cd "$wasm" && cargo test && wasm-pack test --node && wasm-pack test --headless --chrome ); done
scripts.test-firefox: cd .. && for wasm in wasm-*; do (cd "$wasm" && cargo test && wasm-pack test --node && wasm-pack test --headless --firefox ); done
scripts.test-safari: cd .. && for wasm in wasm-*; do (cd "$wasm" && cargo test && wasm-pack test --node && wasm-pack test --headless --safari ); done
